questions.question_text: Which keyboard shortcut opens a new blank document in Word?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + N is the keyboard shortcut for creating a new blank document.

questions.question_text: The Ribbon in Word 2019 contains tabs such as Home, Insert, and Design.
questions.explanation: The Ribbon is organized into tabs like Home, Insert, Design, Layout, etc.

questions.question_text: Which feature allows you to browse by headings, pages, or search results in a document?
questions.explanation: The Navigation Pane lets you browse by headings, pages, or search results.

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of pressing Ctrl + Shift + * in Word?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Shift + * toggles the display of formatting symbols such as paragraph marks and spaces.

questions.question_text: You can only save Word documents in .docx format.
questions.explanation: Word supports multiple formats, including .pdf, .rtf, .txt, and more.

questions.question_text: Which option is part of the Backstage View?
questions.explanation: Backstage View is accessed via the File tab and includes Save, Open, Print, Share, and Export.

questions.question_text: What does Ctrl + G allow you to do in Word?
options: Go to a specific page, section, or bookmark
questions.explanation: Ctrl + G opens the Go To dialog, allowing you to jump to a page, section, line, or bookmark.

questions.question_text: The Quick Access Toolbar cannot be customized.
questions.explanation: The Quick Access Toolbar is customizable and can be set to show your most-used commands.

questions.question_text: Which file format is recommended for sharing a document while preserving its layout and formatting?
questions.explanation: PDF (Portable Document Format) preserves fonts, images, and layout across devices.

questions.question_text: Where can you see the word count and page number in Word?
questions.explanation: The Status Bar at the bottom displays page count, word count, zoom, and view options.

questions.question_text: Bookmarks in Word can only be used in documents longer than 10 pages.
questions.explanation: Bookmarks can be used in documents of any length to mark important locations.

questions.question_text: Which keyboard shortcut opens the Print menu?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + P opens the Print menu in Backstage View.

questions.question_text: What is the main benefit of saving a document to OneDrive?
questions.explanation: OneDrive enables AutoSave, version history, and access from any device.

questions.question_text: The Navigation Pane can only be opened from the View tab.
questions.explanation: The Navigation Pane can also be opened using Ctrl + F or by checking the box in the View tab.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is NOT a way to share a Word document?
options: Export as PDF and send a link
Print and mail a hard copy only
questions.explanation: Word supports multiple sharing methods electronically; printing and mailing is not the only way.
